headline: The Bull Case For Pool (POOL) Could Change Following New EVP Overseeing North America And Digital Initiatives
summary: Pool Corporation recently announced that John Watwood has been hired as executive vice president to lead North American swimming pool operations and digital initiatives, while long-serving Senior Vice President Kenneth “Kenny” G. St. Romain will retire later this year. This leadership transition concentrates operational and technology oversight under new management, a change that can shape how efficiently Pool executes its growth and modernization plans. We’ll now examine how this leadership...
